thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ramsay Generale De Sante H1 Reported EBITDA Falls To 103.7 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ramsay Generale De Sante H1 Reported EBITDA Falls To 103.7 Million Euros
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - RAMSAY GENERALE DE SANTE SA:
* PUBLISHED HALF-YEAR TURNOVER DOWN 1.1% TO EUR 1,066.4 MILLION
* H1 DECLINE IN REPORTED EBITDA BY 11.7% TO EUR 103.7 MILLION
* ‍H1 NET LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE TO GROUP OF EUR 22.1 MILLION (VERSUS PROFIT OF EUR 24.7 MILLION AT END DEC 2016)​
* ‍DECLINE IN H1 REPORTED EBITDA BY 11.7% TO EUR 103.7 MILLION (DOWN 9.2% ON A LIKE-FOR-LIKE BASIS)​
* H1 NET LOSS GROUP SHARE EUR ‍​22.1 MILLION VERSUS PROFIT OF EUR 24.7 MILLION YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom:)
